casebody.data:
Mat, 1950.

(May 3, 1950.) In the Matter of the Estate of Sophie Hoyt, Deceased. Samuel Sapowitch, as Administrator of the Estate of Sophie Hoyt, Deceased, Respondent; Jeanette Ostermeier, Appellant.

Decree affirmed, with costs to the respondent payable out of the estate. All concur. (The decree appealed from directs the delivery to petitioner of certain bankbooks held to belong to the estate of petitioner’s intestate, in a discovery proceeding.) Present — Taylor, P. J., McCurn, Love, Vaughan and Kimball, JJ.
